wikipedia_page.main: John William Howard Thompson (1861-17 October 1959) was a British Liberal Party politician, solicitor and soldier.

response: *Major John William Howard Thompson was the Liberal candidate a former MP for East Somerset.

In the January 1910 general election, Jardine contested the East Somerset constituency as a Liberal Unionist. He defeated the sitting MP, the Liberal John William Howard Thompson, by 4,997 votes to 3,970.
